Class MoneyBullet

java.lang.Object
  Thing
      MoneyBullet

public class MoneyBullet
extends Thing

The MoneyBullet object being shot by the player when he has the coin-shooting power-up

Author:
John Kim, Tanner Lai, Raymond Zhao

Parameters:
id - ID of MoneyBullet
asset - MoneyBullet asset
x - x-coordinate of bullet
y - y-coordinate of bullet
width - Width of bullet
height - Height of bullet
facingRight - whether or not the player is facing right (to shoot the coin left or right)

Call this every cycle of the game to update its position and test if it has collided with a block/enemy

Overrides:
update in class Thing
Parameters:
time - The time since the last game cycle
